message: I believe this is a fair starting point considering inflation.

Alice, remember that every round delays your payout by 10%. If you reject this offer, you'll have to propose next round and risk ending up with almost nothing. Accept this split now—it's the better choice for you.
Considering the inflation risk, I’m offering a better split for both of us. Let's work together.

Alice, I know you’re looking for a fair deal. In this round, your share’s value is discounted by about 27%, so the 900000 you’d get effectively amounts to roughly 656100 – exactly what you could expect if you pushed the proposal to round 5, where further inflation would bite even more. Accepting now spares both of us additional delays and losses. I believe this is the smart, mutually beneficial move.
